summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Economic Development Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on February 3, 2025, at 1:00 PM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss various economic development initiatives and upcoming agenda items.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the January 6, 2025, meeting.
2. Briefings on upcoming agenda items scheduled for February 12 and February 26, 2025, including:
   - Tax Increment Financing (TIF) District Annual Reports.
   - New Markets Tax Credit transaction for St. Philipâ€™s School and Community Center.
   - Updates on economic development incentives and the Small Business Microgrants Program.
   - Amendments to economic development agreements related to the 1708 MLK Redevelopment Project.
   - Construction services contract for the Trinity Strand Trail Hi-Line Span Project.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include discussions on significant proposals such as the amendment of Chapter 380 agreements with Shekinah Legacy Holdings and a construction contract with The Fain Group, Inc. Additionally, there will be a quarterly update on economic development incentives awarded through administrative action.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the meeting minutes and discuss the aforementioned proposals, with decisions to be made regarding the upcoming agenda items and contracts. An executive session may also be held to address legal and negotiation matters related to the agenda items.
